item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description:
Welcome!

This is my first post on this blog. I’m excited to start sharing my thoughts and experiences here.

Why I Started This Blog

I wanted a place to:

  • Document my learning journeys
  • Share knowledge with the community
  • Practice writing regularly
  • Build an online presence

What’s Next

I plan to write about various topics including technology, programming, and personal development. Stay tuned for more posts!

Thanks for stopping by!

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

My name is Sergiu Cibotaru, born in Moldova, and now I live in The Netherlands since 2022. Married, father of 2 adorable kids. I love running, all sorts of DYI and experimentations. Stargazing is another passion. A handy man in general, and renovations is another hobby. I read books, or listen to them; preffering Science fiction, technology books, process improvements, psycology. Listen to podcasts when commuting.

What I Write About (intend to)

  • Technology in general
  • Things I encounter in my day to day live
  • Personal projects and experiments
  • Tips and tutorials
  • Life experiences and reflections

My technology stack is mostly Microsoft based, with deep experience in on-premise Windows Server administration and architecture, Azure as my main cloud provider, Azure DevOps and GitHub as development platform. PowerShell is my tool of choice, Pyhon is an alternative. I also spend lots of my time on the #linux environment, mostly in the shell, with Docker and Kubernetes.
